body_html: @peterjc123: I just pushed another build fix patch to ATen that should get rid of the need for WHOLE_ARCHIVE stuff since it is apparently different across all three OSes. I tried to take the changes in your patch and integrate them into that so that there are fewer breakages, but I might have missed something. The good news is that all the build flags are now set in aten/CMakeLists.txt so we only have to change them in one place now.
body_text: @peterjc123: I just pushed another build fix patch to ATen that should get rid of the need for WHOLE_ARCHIVE stuff since it is apparently different across all three OSes. The good news is that all the build flags are now set in aten/CMakeLists.txt so we only have to change them in one place now.
body: @peterjc123: I just pushed another build fix patch to ATen that should get rid of the need for WHOLE_ARCHIVE stuff since it is apparently different across all three OSes. I tried to take the changes in your patch and integrate them into that so that there are fewer breakages, but I might have missed something. The good news is that all the build flags are now set in `aten/CMakeLists.txt` so we only have to change them in one place now.
